articles.title: Angular 19: Signals Become Default for All Components
articles.description: Angular 19 makes signals the default reactivity system for all components. The new compiler automatically optimizes signal-based code, resulting in 50% smaller bundles and faster runtime performance.
articles.author: Minko Gechev

articles.title: Security Alert: XSS Vulnerability in Angular 17.x
articles.description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability has been discovered in Angular 17.0 to 17.3. Developers should upgrade to Angular 17.3.5 or Angular 18+ immediately to patch this security issue.
articles.author: Max Koretskyi

articles.title: Angular Standalone : Migration complète d'un projet NgModules
articles.description: Guide pas-à-pas pour migrer une application Angular utilisant NgModules vers l'architecture standalone. Découvrez les bénéfices en termes de performances et de maintenabilité.
articles.author: Wassim Chegham

articles.title: Angular Universal SSR: New Streaming Mode Doubles Performance
articles.description: Angular's server-side rendering gets a major upgrade with streaming SSR. Initial page loads are now 2x faster with progressive hydration and improved SEO capabilities.
articles.author: Angular University Team

articles.title: RxJS 8 et Angular : Ce qui change pour vos observables
articles.description: RxJS 8 apporte des breaking changes importants. Découvrez comment adapter votre code Angular et profiter des nouvelles fonctionnalités comme les opérateurs simplifiés.
articles.author: Cédric Exbrayat

articles.title: Angular Testing in 2025: Component Testing Best Practices
articles.description: Comprehensive guide to testing Angular applications with Jasmine, Karma, and the new Testing Library integration. Learn modern approaches to unit and integration testing.
articles.author: Jessica Janiuk

articles.title: Angular Material 3 : Design Material You et accessibilité
articles.description: Angular Material 3 adopte le design Material You de Google avec une personnalisation avancée des thèmes. Améliorations majeures de l'accessibilité WCAG 2.2 AA.
articles.author: Sébastien Ollivier

articles.title: Building Micro-Frontends with Angular Module Federation
articles.description: Learn how to architect large-scale Angular applications using Module Federation. This guide covers setup, communication patterns, and deployment strategies for micro-frontends.
articles.author: Manfred Steyer
